basicInfo.desc: This Task provides the ability to browse elements of an Attribute. Includes the ability to perform filtering and incremental fetch.

parameter.name: styleName
parameter.desc: The style to use to transform the FolderBean.

parameter.name: filterXML
parameter.desc: Specifies the xml representation of the filter. This xml can be obtained from calling getXML() on WebFilter object.

parameter.name: dimensionID
parameter.desc: Specifies the MicroStrategy DSSID of the dimension which attribute is in. If this parameter is missing, the system dimension will be used.

parameter.name: attributeID
parameter.desc: Specifies the MicroStrategy DSSID of the attribute.

parameter.name: searchPattern
parameter.desc: Specifies the search pattern.

parameter.name: matchCase
parameter.desc: Specifies whether the search should be performed with case sensitive or not.

parameter.name: blockBegin
parameter.desc: Specifies the blockBegin property for incremental fetch.

parameter.name: blockCount
parameter.desc: Specifies the blockCount property for incremental fetch.

parameter.name: dataSourcesXML
parameter.desc: Specifies the xml representation of the datasources. This xml can be obtained by calling getDataSources() on the WebObjectInfo object

parameter.name: includeFormNames
parameter.desc: Specifies whether the task needs to retrieve information regarding the attribute form title.

parameter.name: includeFormValues
parameter.desc: Specifies whether the task needs to populate individual form values

parameter.name: displayedForms
parameter.desc: Specifies which forms to display. Valid values are from enumeration EnumWebDisplayForms. Default value is 1 for browse forms.

parameter.name: shortFilterXML
parameter.desc: Specifies the xml representation of the filter in the short form. This xml can be obtained from calling getXML() on WebFilter object.

parameter.name: targetAttributeID
parameter.desc: Specifies the MicroStrategy DSSID of the attribute, which would be the search target. If this is not specified, attributeID would be used as target of search

parameter.name: searchForms
parameter.desc: Specifies the attribute forms the search should apply on during retrieving elements of this attribute. It should be a list of form DSSID delimited by ';'.

parameter.name: messageID
parameter.desc: Specifies the message ID to use as the context for browsing elements related to a message (report/ RW instance)

parameter.name: datasetID
parameter.desc: Specifies the dataset ID to use as the context for browsing elements based on a dataset in a RW document

parameter.name: includeWeight
parameter.desc: Specifies whether to include the weight property for each attribute element

parameter.name: ctlKey
parameter.desc: Specifies the search selector key

parameter.name: rawInput
parameter.desc: Specifies the user's raw input

parameter.name: templateNodeKey
parameter.desc: Specifies the template node we what to browse elements for. This is primarily for Cube Join.

parameter.name: browseFlags
parameter.desc: Specifies the format of the id we request, whether short ID or terse ID.
